title: Modern Warfare’s Killstreak Problem - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.31.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://Upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Gary Whitta and Greg talk about war, chips, and EA.

Time Stamps - 
00:06:50 - Housekeeping
Wolfenstein Party Mode is up on patreon.com/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Colton Yoder, Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:28 - Modern Warfare Multiplayer, Tom Philips @ Eurogamer
00:28:09 - EA Tidbits
00:33:00 Best Friend Q. - Do you ever seeing Nintendo and Switch ever trying to create a beefier console like XBox One and PS4, so they can get those bigger selling games, like Call Of Duty or Assassin's Creed? - BJ Bernardo
00:51:50 - Trump Tariff might make your POS4 Cost More, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:52:50 Best Friend Q. - Sony recently stated that it might raise the prices of its consoles if Trump's tariffs with China go through. Do you guys think, with the expected higher price of the PS5 and with the tariff costs, that we might experience another PS3 $599 situation in the near future? - Fendyy
00:56:20 -  Red Dead Online Leaves Beta
01:00:10 - Out today
00:58:00 -  THIRDLOVE
00:59:00 -  UPSTART
Reader mail   -
01:05:18 - Gary, as a screenwriter do you purposefully write in potential memes? Is this something you can or can’t control?  - 2038 Pokémon CEO
01:06:47 - Squad Up:Tyler from Ontario Canada(Xbox One) - FatsBeardo
01:08:00 - ONE OF THEM ROTATIN’ SEGMENTS: How Over 25 People Got Scammed Into Working At A Nonexistent Game Company - Ceciia @ Kotaku
01:10:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Greg and Andrea
